nodes.text: Naro was a male Selkath Je'daii Temple Master serving the Je'daii Order on Tython at the height of the Infinite Empire's reign.

A Force-sensitive Selkath, Naro was trained in the ways of the Force by the Je'daii Order on the planet Tython, one of nine planets in the Tython system which made up the Settled Worlds. Appointed as a Je'daii Temple Master, the highest ranking members of the Order, the couple Naro and Calleh jointly governed the Great Temple of Healing, Mahara Kesh. Both Naro and Calleh and the other Temple Masters formed the Je'daii Council, meeting via holocommunication at the Temple of Balance, Akar Kesh.
